title: Champagne Taste, IKEA Budget: Outdoor Kitchen Ideas for Less
description: Creating an outdoors that’s an extension of your living space is a hot trend any time of year. However, summertime certainly invites more opportunities for patio picnics, barbecue potlucks, and al fresco dinner parties. Whether you have plenty of room to spare on your patio or a limited backyard, IKEA delivers plenty of possibilities. Its modular pieces allow you to build out a perfectly-sized kitchen that goes way beyond a simple barbecue. So, fire up the grill! Everyone from amateur […] The post Champagne Taste, IKEA Budget: Outdoor Kitchen Ideas for Less appeared first on IKEA Hackers.
author: Stacy Randall
excerpt: Get ready to take your backyard to the next level with these sizzling outdoor kitchen ideas. Best of all, you don't need a big budget to set up an outdoor kitchen with style.
text: Creating an outdoors that’s an extension of your living space is a hot trend any time of year. However, summertime certainly invites more opportunities for patio picnics, barbecue potlucks, and al fresco dinner parties. Whether you have plenty of room to spare on your patio or a limited backyard, IKEA delivers plenty of possibilities. Its modular pieces allow you to build out a perfectly-sized kitchen that goes way beyond a simple barbecue. So, fire up the grill! Everyone from amateur chefs to seasoned grill masters, get ready to take your backyard to the next level with these sizzling outdoor kitchen ideas. Best of all, you don’t need a big budget to set up an outdoor kitchen with style. High-End Backyard Kitchen Ideas That Won’t Break the Bank Photo Credit: GRILLSKÄR Outdoor Kitchen | IKEA.com IKEA features two main collections of modular outdoor kitchens, GRILLSKÄR and BÅTSKÄR, GRILLSKÄR being the more affordable range. Both collections include a variety of shelves, tables, storage, and sink options. These pieces provide an excellent foundation for your outdoor kitchen, whether you use one piece or all of them. The individual units allow you to mix and match as you wish to fit your space and needs. Photo Credit: BÅTSKÄR Outdoor Kitchen With Charcoal Grill and Bar Table | IKEA.com Here’s another bonus of a modular kitchen (besides affordability). They aren’t built-in or cemented into place. Unlike ridiculously expensive custom kitchens, modular pieces give you the power to make adjustments to your layout. You can change it up when you want. You get the benefits of DIY with a designer look — plus, if you decide to move, you get to bring your outdoor kitchen with you. Here are the pieces we’ll ring up if we’re setting up an outdoor kitchen. Yes, You Can Have A Sink Outside Photo Credit: GRILLSKÄR Sink Unit | IKEA.com A unit like the stainless steel GRILLSKÄR sink and shelf is perfect for storing meal-prep essentials, rinsing vegetables, and washing dirty dishes. It attaches to your regular garden hose, giving you a convenient water source near your cookspace, just like your indoor kitchen. Smart Storage That Works Outdoors Photo Credit: BÅTSKÄR Closed Kitchen Unit | IKEA.com Closed-storage units like the BÅTSKÄR cabinets keep your outdoor kitchen streamlined and stylish. The cabinet doors make it a breeze to hide cookware and supplies out of sight. Extend Kitchen Function with Back Panels Photo Credit: GRILLSKÄR Back Panel | IKEA.com The GRILLSKÄR panel attaches to a GRILLSKÄR base unit, giving you a spot to keep must-have items within easy reach. Pick Your Perfect Grill Photo Credit: BÅTSKÄR Charcoal Grill | IKEA.com IKEA has charcoal grills and gas grills, so you’re covered no matter what your cooking preference. Photo Credit: GRILLSKÄR Gas Grill | IKEA.com The grills blend seamlessly with the modular kitchen collections, integrating easily into your design. Don’t Forget the Grill Accessories Photo Credit: GRILLTIDER Three-Piece Barbecue Set | IKEA.com IKEA makes it easy to find the grill accessories you need for any menu. You can’t cook without the right tools, and IKEA’s GRILLTIDER line has everything you need. Photo Credit: GRILLTIDER Cleaning Brush | IKEA.com From go-to grill utensils that get things started to stainless steel skewers to a cleaning brush for when the cooking is done. Photo Credit: UPPFYLLD Tenderizer Tool Set | IKEA.com Make sure everything is just right by making the most of your prep time. The UPPFYLID tenderizer tools let you marinate and tenderize meat and veggies to your heart’s content. Dine Outdoors in Style Photo Credit: FÅGELÖN Gazebo | IKEA.com What good is whipping up a tasty meal outdoors if you don’t have a nice place to enjoy it? Make the most of your outdoor kitchen by setting up a cozy spot for guests to dig in. Photo Credit: NÄMMARÖ Privacy Screen | IKEA.com Picture this. A nice gazebo provides a shady spot to dine al fresco. Or set up a privacy screen to create a secluded garden bistro. Photo Credit: GRILLTIDER Stainless Steel Serving Tray, Bowls, and Basket | IKEA.com Stainless steel servingware is durable, making it ideal for outdoor use. Use pieces for prep, serving, and eating, making your outdoor meal a visual treat from start to finish. Photo Credit: KALAS Plates | IKEA.com The KALAS line offers playful pops of color for a dash of whimsy and cheer to your outdoor tablescape. Set the Mood with Outdoor Lighting Photo Credit: SOLVINDEN LED Floor Lamp | IKEA.com As the sun sets, keep the fun going with ambient lighting using LED string lights, stylish outdoor wall sconces, or a unique floor lamp (currently on sale!). Ready to Cook Up Your Own Outdoor Oasis? There’s no better time to upgrade your outdoor space — and with IKEA’s smart, modular outdoor kitchen solutions, it’s easier (and more affordable) than ever. Need more outdoor kitchen ideas? Check out IKEA for more outdoor kitchen inspiration and design ideas, Take a peek at this IKEA outdoor kitchen on TikTok. Watch this video on how to put together a functional, affordable outdoor kitchen using IKEA units. Are you ready to give your backyard an upgrade? Tell us what you have cooking, and share your photos and tips. We’d love to see it! html:
Creating an outdoors that’s an extension of your living space is a hot trend any time of year. However, summertime certainly invites more opportunities for patio picnics, barbecue potlucks, and al fresco dinner parties.

Whether you have plenty of room to spare on your patio or a limited backyard, IKEA delivers plenty of possibilities. Its modular pieces allow you to build out a perfectly-sized kitchen that goes way beyond a simple barbecue.

So, fire up the grill!

Everyone from amateur chefs to seasoned grill masters, get ready to take your backyard to the next level with these sizzling outdoor kitchen ideas. Best of all, you don’t need a big budget to set up an outdoor kitchen with style.

High-End Backyard Kitchen Ideas That Won’t Break the Bank

IKEA features two main collections of modular outdoor kitchens, GRILLSKÄR and BÅTSKÄR, GRILLSKÄR being the more affordable range. Both collections include a variety of shelves, tables, storage, and sink options.

These pieces provide an excellent foundation for your outdoor kitchen, whether you use one piece or all of them. The individual units allow you to mix and match as you wish to fit your space and needs.

Here’s another bonus of a modular kitchen (besides affordability). They aren’t built-in or cemented into place. Unlike ridiculously expensive custom kitchens, modular pieces give you the power to make adjustments to your layout.

You can change it up when you want. You get the benefits of DIY with a designer look — plus, if you decide to move, you get to bring your outdoor kitchen with you.

Here are the pieces we’ll ring up if we’re setting up an outdoor kitchen.

Yes, You Can Have A Sink Outside

A unit like the stainless steel GRILLSKÄR sink and shelf is perfect for storing meal-prep essentials, rinsing vegetables, and washing dirty dishes. It attaches to your regular garden hose, giving you a convenient water source near your cookspace, just like your indoor kitchen.

Smart Storage That Works Outdoors

Closed-storage units like the BÅTSKÄR cabinets keep your outdoor kitchen streamlined and stylish. The cabinet doors make it a breeze to hide cookware and supplies out of sight.

Extend Kitchen Function with Back Panels

The GRILLSKÄR panel attaches to a GRILLSKÄR base unit, giving you a spot to keep must-have items within easy reach.

Pick Your Perfect Grill

IKEA has charcoal grills and gas grills, so you’re covered no matter what your cooking preference.

The grills blend seamlessly with the modular kitchen collections, integrating easily into your design.

Don’t Forget the Grill Accessories

IKEA makes it easy to find the grill accessories you need for any menu. You can’t cook without the right tools, and IKEA’s GRILLTIDER line has everything you need.

From go-to grill utensils that get things started to stainless steel skewers to a cleaning brush for when the cooking is done.

Make sure everything is just right by making the most of your prep time. The UPPFYLID tenderizer tools let you marinate and tenderize meat and veggies to your heart’s content.

Dine Outdoors in Style

What good is whipping up a tasty meal outdoors if you don’t have a nice place to enjoy it? Make the most of your outdoor kitchen by setting up a cozy spot for guests to dig in.

Picture this. A nice gazebo provides a shady spot to dine al fresco. Or set up a privacy screen to create a secluded garden bistro.

Stainless steel servingware is durable, making it ideal for outdoor use. Use pieces for prep, serving, and eating, making your outdoor meal a visual treat from start to finish.

The KALAS line offers playful pops of color for a dash of whimsy and cheer to your outdoor tablescape.

Set the Mood with Outdoor Lighting

As the sun sets, keep the fun going with ambient lighting using LED string lights, stylish outdoor wall sconces, or a unique floor lamp (currently on sale!).

Ready to Cook Up Your Own Outdoor Oasis?

There’s no better time to upgrade your outdoor space — and with IKEA’s smart, modular outdoor kitchen solutions, it’s easier (and more affordable) than ever.

Need more outdoor kitchen ideas?

  • Check out IKEA for more outdoor kitchen inspiration and design ideas,
  • Take a peek at this IKEA outdoor kitchen on TikTok.
  • Watch this video on how to put together a functional, affordable outdoor kitchen using IKEA units.

Are you ready to give your backyard an upgrade? Tell us what you have cooking, and share your photos and tips. We’d love to see it!
